channel.title: Project Endeavor - Striving For Excellence
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/ru64gx.jpg[/img] Runescape Private Servers have been around since 2005. The first server was almost nothing. You would fly around the Runescape map as an invisible character (hence the nickname "Flight through RuneScape"). We have come along way. But the reality is, servers are always the same thing. Player Killing and a shop economy. Think about all the servers you have played. How many have you actually enjoyed totally? That's where Endeavor comes in.
I focus on the community more than anything else. This server is targeted at people that enjoy community. It will be an all around fun server. A staff requirement is friendliness, so there's no need to worry about abuse. This is your server. Support us and suggest to us.
~ The Team ~
[ul][*]Mikey` [list] [*]Main server programmer. [/list][/ul]
I started this project because I believe Private Servers aren't going anywhere with only Player Killing servers. My server will focus on everything that made the old Runescape enjoyable. Player Killing will be in the server, but it won't be the main feature.
Also, I've noticed in most servers, the Staff members don't respect their playerss. The Staff of Endeavor has a requirement of Player Respect.
[ul][*][IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/rcvwye.png[/img]Player Helper [list] [*]In order to be a Player Helper you must be an exceptional player in all the categories. You must be helpful, willing to help when asked, nice, good grammar, and you must be active. They help players with in-game features. [/list] [*][IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2ep7nsz.png[/img]Player Moderator [list] [*]Players Moderators must handle all Player Reports and help players whenever possible (besides in-game feature help). They must also be active. [/list] [*][IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/24yvf5y.png[/img]Administrator [list] [*]Administrators are only people I have known for a long period of time. If a Moderator has been consistent with their position and have been a good help they may be promoted. Administrators must be friendly, and helpful as much as possible (I cannot stress this enough). They have access to my personal cell-phone numbers in case they urgently need me. [/list]
[list] [/list] [*]Every member of the Staff gets access to features that are still in Beta. By this I mean they get to test features that are not yet available to regular players. After the Beta features are released to the public they will lose anything they gained (if anything) from the feature.[/ul]
~ Game-play Specifications ~
Endeavor will have content from Runescape revision 474 and under only.
~ July 30 - July 31 ~
- Removed Clan Chat. - Removed Minigames. - Removed all Skills. - Cleaned up a lot of the classes and removed what isn't needed. - Made the classes easier to read and made everything neater. - Removed almost everything content-wise besides PvP and PvN. - Cleaning up here and there. - Completely removed everything to do with dueling. - Removed all special shops. - Removed a lot of useless godwars, pest control, and mage arena stuff. - Cleaned up the data folder. Looks a lot more organized now. - Re-packaged some stuff.
~ July 30 ~ - Got Project Insanity working on a blank 317 Refactored client. - Began cleaning the server (see cleaning log). - Re-initialized the Idle Logout packet.
~ July 31 ~ - Added a Teleporting class. - Moving items while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division). - Banking while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division). - Dropping items while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division). - Full Modern and Ancient teleporting (no runes or levels required). - Full saving of every option on the wrench tab (and auto retaliation).
~ August 1 ~ - Cleaned up some stuff.
~ August 4 ~ - Client loads headicons through the cache (Thanks Mister Stewie). - Headicons server side for prayers. - 459 Sideicons. - Full screen interfaces (Thanks Mister Stewie). - Full screen welcome interface loaded upon login (client sided). - Player Helper crown loaded via the cache.
~ August 6 ~ - Sounds loading client sided (Thanks dophert). - Started sounds base server sided (the sound volume is loaded from the wrench tab and saved upon logout - see July 31). - Fixed headicons error. - Sound ID 0 is now a blank sound (it did play on login and I was forced to use it for a return integer). - Sounds so far: Whip, all Scimitars, all Daggers, food, teleports, and a few prayers.
~ August 7 ~ - Fixed special attack sound if you click special but don't have enough special energy.
~ August 8 ~ - Started Herblore base.
~ August 9 ~ - Herb Identifying 100%. - Unfinished Potions 100%. - Got all text on the 377 Welcome Interface editable (thanks to Riotscape)(check media). - Started Runecrafting base.
[IMG]http://is.gd/eaqkC[/img]
[IMG]http://is.gd/eanjN[/img]
Misc [IMG]http://is.gd/e8aXp[/img]
[IMG]http://is.gd/e8ebQ[/img]
[IMG]http://is.gd/edMUi[/img]
[IMG]http://is.gd/e8d78[/img]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/u/qwoxex.png[/img]
[IMG]http://is.gd/eh5hJ[/img]
Videos [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V8Z30_09faA]YouTube - ‪Project Endeavor - Sounds & Tab Saving Preview‬‎[/url]
Thread will not be updated often. The official thread is on Rune Server [/CENTER]

item.title: Project Endeavor - Striving For Excellence
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:2, topic:355241”]It’s nice to see a server other then delta!

Woot first post

I like how you did the opening screen, reminds me of the good days of rs, back when I was happy I had bronze :)[/quote]

PI is the new delta

OT: goodluck, from the first pic to the last, it looks like youve added 474 items, i would update your herblore messages so that they dont cont "to find that its a " so that its “You clean the dirt from the (blah)”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mikey2 Mikey`
item.description:
@Mikey2 wrote:

[CENTER]

ru64gx.jpg800×100

Runescape Private Servers have been around since 2005. The first server was almost nothing. You would fly around the Runescape map as an invisible character (hence the nickname “Flight through RuneScape”). We have come along way. But the reality is, servers are always the same thing. Player Killing and a shop economy. Think about all the servers you have played. How many have you actually enjoyed totally? That’s where Endeavor comes in.

I focus on the community more than anything else. This server is targeted at people that enjoy community. It will be an all around fun server. A staff requirement is friendliness, so there’s no need to worry about abuse. This is your server. Support us and suggest to us.

~ The Team ~

[ul][]Mikey`
[list]
[]Main server programmer.
[/list][/ul]

I started this project because I believe Private Servers aren’t going anywhere with only Player Killing servers.
My server will focus on everything that made the old Runescape enjoyable. Player Killing will be in the server, but it won’t be the main feature.

Also, I’ve noticed in most servers, the Staff members don’t respect their playerss. The Staff of Endeavor has a requirement of Player Respect.

[ul][]Player Helper
[list]
[]In order to be a Player Helper you must be an exceptional player in all the categories. You must be helpful, willing to help when asked, nice, good grammar, and you must be active. They help players with in-game features.
[/list]
[]Player Moderator

[]Players Moderators must handle all Player Reports and help players whenever possible (besides in-game feature help). They must also be active.

[]Administrator

[]Administrators are only people I have known for a long period of time. If a Moderator has been consistent with their position and have been a good help they may be promoted. Administrators must be friendly, and helpful as much as possible (I cannot stress this enough). They have access to my personal cell-phone numbers in case they urgently need me.
[/list]

[list]
[/list]
[*]Every member of the Staff gets access to features that are still in Beta. By this I mean they get to test features that are not yet available to regular players. After the Beta features are released to the public they will lose anything they gained (if anything) from the feature.[/ul]

~ Game-play Specifications ~

Endeavor will have content from Runescape revision 474 and under only.

~ July 30 - July 31 ~

  • Removed Clan Chat.
  • Removed Minigames.
  • Removed all Skills.
  • Cleaned up a lot of the classes and removed what isn’t needed.
  • Made the classes easier to read and made everything neater.
  • Removed almost everything content-wise besides PvP and PvN.
  • Cleaning up here and there.
  • Completely removed everything to do with dueling.
  • Removed all special shops.
  • Removed a lot of useless godwars, pest control, and mage arena stuff.
  • Cleaned up the data folder. Looks a lot more organized now.
  • Re-packaged some stuff.

~ July 30 ~

  • Got Project Insanity working on a blank 317 Refactored client.
  • Began cleaning the server (see cleaning log).
  • Re-initialized the Idle Logout packet.

~ July 31 ~

  • Added a Teleporting class.
  • Moving items while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division).
  • Banking while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division).
  • Dropping items while trading dupe fixed (Thanks Division).
  • Full Modern and Ancient teleporting (no runes or levels required).
  • Full saving of every option on the wrench tab (and auto retaliation).

~ August 1 ~

  • Cleaned up some stuff.

~ August 4 ~

  • Client loads headicons through the cache (Thanks Mister Stewie).
  • Headicons server side for prayers.
  • 459 Sideicons.
  • Full screen interfaces (Thanks Mister Stewie).
  • Full screen welcome interface loaded upon login (client sided).
  • Player Helper crown loaded via the cache.

~ August 6 ~

  • Sounds loading client sided (Thanks dophert).
  • Started sounds base server sided (the sound volume is loaded from the wrench tab and saved upon logout - see July 31).
  • Fixed headicons error.
  • Sound ID 0 is now a blank sound (it did play on login and I was forced to use it for a return integer).
  • Sounds so far: Whip, all Scimitars, all Daggers, food, teleports, and a few prayers.

~ August 7 ~

~ August 8 ~

  • Started Herblore base.

~ August 9 ~

  • Herb Identifying 100%.
  • Unfinished Potions 100%.
  • Got all text on the 377 Welcome Interface editable (thanks to Riotscape)(check media).
  • Started Runecrafting base.
